body.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 3 (41mm, GPS, Bluetooth) Smart Watch Mystic Bronze (US Version, Renewed)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 50 mins.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Galaxy Watch3 combines powerful technology with a premium, customizable design so you can manage the day-today from your wrist, beautifully.
Keep an eye on wellness with advanced health monitoring, and go for days without charging.

Keep an eye on your fitness and health with SpO2, VO2 max, and heart-rate monitoring. Help is just a tap away if you stumble. And track your cycle in an easy and discreet way. *This device and related software are not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease. SPO2, VO2 max and running coach features not available at the time of launch, will become available during Q3. Features will require a software update. **This device and related software are not intended for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment or prevention of disease. ***Trip detection recognizes falls when engaged in dynamic motion, not when still. Requires network connection to notify emergency contact. GPS accuracy may be affected by obstructions to satellite signal such as buildings.
Galaxy Watch3 combines style—two sizes, three colors, 50,000-plus watch faces and premium leather bands—with military-grade durability and water resistance.
Spend your time moving while Galaxy Watch3 tracks seven popular activities automatically. Get more out of each movement thanks to a built-in run coaching.
body.description: Spend your time moving while Galaxy Watch3 tracks seven popular activities automatically. Get more out of each movement thanks to a built-in run coaching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for a cheap price
reviews.reviewText: The watch came in a generic box but was bubble wrapped inside. The item was pre disassembled but each part was well protected. It was fine since I was going To be using a different silicon band I had ordered from Amazon anyway. The watch was not charged yet so I placed on the charger and within a few minutes it showed it was charging. The device I ordered was the 44mm version and it's gorgeous and has a large touch screen and the specific model (Galaxy 3) has a rotating bezel to navigate also so your not stuck only touching it. It's looks new and not refurbished at all. I bought It in mystic silver and it looks sharp with the orange band or any color real being that it's silver. Much better than all black like a lot of other watches and definitely not boring to the eyes. The clean lines really pop with the shiny silver reflection from the light. Lets me control the Bluetooth in my car on SoundCloud and I can touch the screen or rotate the bezel to change tracks on my playlists which is pretty cool! I also can answer calls or reply to texts on the watch without having my phone on me which is awesome and convenient. I can also change the watch face to custom pics like my cat or me and my gf. I love the sleep tracker that tells me REM, deep,and overall amount of sleep, my heart rate,blood pressure and steps. I can set goals for the day or week and when you meet them it vibrates and says Good job. I can also voice reply messages with the built-in mic. So many features for u der 70 dollars. I don't know why you would need to buy one new. Amazon stands by the product and returns are easy if there is anything not right. Refurbished is better than new because it's tested and made sure to work correctly unlike a new item that is done by the end consumer. I bought my gf one and me and was still less money than a new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clean and functional
reviews.reviewText: I got mine in today! It was easy to set up, it's clean and no scratches or damage very well restored. It works just fine too, not glitchy or anything. The only complaint I have is it didn't come already charged and took a out 3 hours to charge but it's not that big of a deal. All around great product and happy I ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A $300 watch for $47. Refurbished works and looks like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really great!!, just a couple thoughts
reviews.reviewText: I love that the screen looks brand new, no pixels are broken, no scratches on the screen. Perfect functionality, operating system works 100%.Only reasons I didn’t give it 5 stars, was due to wrong band size so I had to purchase one at Best Buy. And because it has more scratches than expected for the refurbished quality(it’s not like i wouldn’t purchase it again just it’s more than expected).^note that this may not happen to you just look out for that.Couple things to expect, the band and charger that came in the box with it are both off brand , they were not original to the watch. But the charger works good, just not original to the watch if that was what you were hoping/ looking for.The battery does last long, wore it since 4am till 7pm and was only at 67%.10/10 would recommend as a gift for someone.!! Quite cheap for everything I got!The band was definitely not great quality so maybe purchase a different one regardless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The watch is very attractive and easy to set up and it does everything it says its supposed to do only thing i don't like it don't stay charged very long

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This watch was a gift for my girlfriend and it was all it's supposed to do , it came in a plastic bag not a box so it was a disappointment but the watch is working and it's a great bargain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality watch, no scratches or dents. The watch arrived with the battery dead, but once it was fully charged the battery lasts around 2 days. I love the color! Can't beat the price either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great watch! (Disappointing battery life.)
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I love this watch. It is comfortable and hardy. Texts can be composed and sent to anyone in contact list (some watches I've tried only allow preset quick replies). Watch can call on wifi without phone nearby but the range it stays connected is actually great. The speaker is on the top side of the face so it doesn't muffle when I move my wrist. Many of the optional faces are very customizable.Does most everything I wanted from a watch except I am unable to play my Amazon Music through it and the battery lasts about 20 hrs, give or take a couple (and I like the sleep monitor function so sucks to charge it so often).

reviews.reviewerName: Todo perfecto me encantoTodo perfecto me encanto

reviews.reviewText: Watch came looking brand new. Love the band and overall performance of the watch. The battery does seem to drain quickly but changing the settings so you push the button to turn on, helps

Llevo casi un mes de uso y es muy buen reloj, llegan antes de lo fecha indicada, parece nuevo, muy elegante, rápido, muchas carátulas, lo compre por el medidor de presión sin embargo no lo puedo usar ya que no tengo celular Samsung, resiste dulce y salada sin ningún problema, solo después de meterse al mar enjuagen con agua potable ya que se le mete tierra, el único fallo que le pongo es la batería, dirá lo de un día y si descargas la música en spoty te dura al rededor de 3 horas y aveces falla el GPS, se soluciona reiniciando el reloj le pongo 9/10 por el tema de la batería.

Gorgeous watch that works great! I got too drunk and lost it at a friend's pool party. They found it a couple of days later slightly under their deck. It had rained like crazy so I thought it was junked but nope the magnificent little b is still running perfectly!

Llevo ya unos meses uszandolo y no me arrepiento de la excelente compra, estaba dudoso de comprarlo ya que es un producto reacondicionado, pero ahora estoy muy satisfecho ya que la bateria dura bastante y el reloj funciona a la perfección, realemente ayuda bastante a las tareas diarias.
